website_summaries.verdict: An elegant space-saving towel rack for small bathrooms.
pros: Double the storage capacity of a single towel bar without taking up more space
cons: More expensive than the other products listed here

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This towel rack works exactly as you'd suspect it would. With my limited wall space It perfectly holds two towels. Plus it is ridiculolsly easy to install. The best part is that it comes with a paper insert that you can tape to the wall to use as a guide. Just make sure the paper is leveled out and you just drill directly through the paper. This will take away the 10 minutes you'd normally spend measuring, measuring, and remeasuring. Plus it's about $20 cheaper than the ones you might find at Lowes or Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Nest

customer_reviews.title: Serves its Purpose
customer_reviews.text: For someone who knows what they're doing, it's probably an easy install. I'm not that person. I had difficulty but I have no business using a drill. That said, I did get it hung up. The bars are loose (they roll in circles). Not sure if it's an install error or the way the bars are. The bars are a cheap plastic. The ends that the bars attach to feel more sturdy and better quality. I think they're fine. I will probably get someone to help reinstall them and then I may update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl9675

customer_reviews.title: Great for thick towels.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about this I have a small bathroom. My son broke out old rack by trying to shove his bath sheet on the rod. I needed a rack that offered more room. I love this thing. The bars spin a little which makes it easy to load. It doesn’t stick out as far as I imagined too.
customer_reviews.author: singhsongs

customer_reviews.title: Kinda dinky
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of delicate- the bars are not thick at all, and it doesn't hold two standard towels very well. I've already had one side back out the wall due to the flimsy anchors. Used much bigger ones a second time, but I still think two towels overwhelms this rod. It looks nice to sell the house, but towels now get thrown over the shower curtain rod.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It looks okay but the quality is poor. It feels thin and hollow and the bars move and make a squeaking noise. I kept it because my husband likes the chrome look but I think the ones at Costco are of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials, good price
customer_reviews.text: I knew I got a bargain towel bar. I wasn’t expecting it to be heavy and high quality. Well I was spot on. Although it looks nice, I don’t think it was built to last. The bars feel almost like they are plastic but maybe it’s just cheap metal (aluminum)? Whatever it is, I don’t think this will last long with my kids. Def get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Marzan

customer_reviews.title: Very Light Duty
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Kohler 24" towel bar and a Barley toilet paper holder and the steel bar are very sturdy on both products. This Moen tower bar and other bathroom towel bars, rings, toilet paper holder, the bar/tubing wall is too thin, very light and can bend easily. I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: O Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty, but study enough for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Does everything you need it to do. Materials aren't terrible, but could be sturdier. I have it on the back of the door and would worry what would happen to this if slammed against the wall or setting else
customer_reviews.author: Michael Walker

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking. Won't stay on the wall.
customer_reviews.text: The rack looks nice on a wall. That's about it. The rails are too close to each other which makes it difficult to put towels on and off. But the biggest disappointing issue is the hardware. The bar just won't stay on the base clip. As previous reviewers pointed out, poor engineering at this point. And this appears to be the problem with all Moen latest wall mount products. We ordered a set of several items to match, only one of them I was able to install without problems. Won't recommend to buy until the mounting problem is solved.
customer_reviews.author: ilyared

customer_reviews.title: moen shower bar is ok, cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: the end pieces seem solid, but the cross tubes are paper thin, feel like plastic! i dont know how its evem possible to chrome someting so thin, feels cheap for the money it cost
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't set as well as I'd like
customer_reviews.text: Constantly falls off the brackets if you push too hard on it. I have it screwed in with anchors but the set screw is not the best and is less than a millimeter to make contact with the bracket. The brackets are secure, but the set screw is the problem as you can only get it so tight Also, the bars are not far enough apart that my kids just drape the towel over the entire double bar cause you have to squeeze it in between both bars to have it used properly. I like the idea of it but the set screw is the bigger problem. Thinking of replacing
customer_reviews.author: Whit

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect solution to having damp towels in FL. It's so hard for them to dry hanging on a hook so we installed this towel bar and it's far enough away from wall the towel dries great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Norton

customer_reviews.title: crap anchors for drywall
customer_reviews.text: For a drywall installation you would have to drill 3/16 holes, not 1/4 as the manual suggestion, otherwise your screws will fall off the wall along with anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Sergiy

customer_reviews.title: Hope you have better luck with this than I did
customer_reviews.text: Yes, easy to install but it would not stay on the wall. Go to grab a towel, the bars and one of the bar holders fall off. Go to hang a towel, same thing. At this rate, it’s easier to hang on a doorknob, at least I can depend on that. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JenBNC

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Good product, although I struggled to get it installed. As long as you follow the directions, (don't take shortcuts, like I tried to!) it'll work great! We love having the double bar, to let 2 towels air dry at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The double towel bar fitted the bill when I opted ...
customer_reviews.text: The double towel bar fitted the bill when I opted for one towel bar versus two after a recent bath remodel. Gives me the hanging space I had before without the additional clutter of a second bar. I did have a little trouble after the initial install with one side of the bar coming out of the bracket, but I think it was not properly seated when I installed it the first time as it has been secure ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Graham

customer_reviews.title: Just OK.  Nothing to brag about.
customer_reviews.text: A perfectly adequate towel bar, but nothing to brag about. I've purchased other towel bars that are much more substantial, at a lower price. If you're looking for fashion, this towel bar isn't what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Real Unbiased Reviews

customer_reviews.title: This product came without hardware and more...
customer_reviews.text: This product came without hardware except one screw, no instructions, no promised template... I contacted Amazon, but I have not heard anything from them, and that was on Friday!
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: Brushed finish is possible with a little DIY.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but didn’t realize it only came in chrome finish when I bought it. I used various scotchbrite pads to give the whole thing a brushed finish. Now it matches all of my brushed nickel look Preston hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I installed one in each bathroom of my modular home. I used moly bolts instead of screws, so they are very secure. We put four wet towels on them with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Moen Towel Bar beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: The bathroom double towel bar is beautiful and matches the 18" perfectly. I was looking for a 30" single Preston to go with the hand towel bar and toilet paper holder. They do not make this length! That is the only thing that is not satisfactory about this product. We use over sized bath sheets and it is hard to hang them side by side on the 24" towel bar. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SMuse

customer_reviews.title: Great for small bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a small bathroom with little wall space. It easily holds 2 towels and they dry in a reasonable amount of time. Much better than hanging on a door hook.
customer_reviews.author: FLKeeper

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for a year and it just broke off the wall, a piece of metal just broke off.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as my old towel rack. Looks nice and doesn’t stick out too far. Just thought it would be a little heavier.
customer_reviews.author: sue schancer

customer_reviews.title: Nice space saver
customer_reviews.text: Good space saver. I wouldn't recommend for Big fluffy towels. I would recommend the MoEn Sage double towel bar for those. Easy to install but you must be sure to measure accurately. If you're off by a little you the towel bar base will be not be flush and it's pieces are not very forgiving as far as placement. Looks nice. sturdy design. instructions well stated. comes with an easy template to use, but since it is paper I believe i didnt' have it tight enough for full length.
customer_reviews.author: J Cahta

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it'd look great! If you can get it on the wall
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it'd look great! If you can get it on the wall. I recently bought a moen set for my other bath from Lowes and it had a far better mounting system (I bet this is an older model). If this isn't drilled exact (which apparently using the guides isn't enough) it won't fit. It took FOREVER to get it up. Plus I dropped pieces 10 or so times which damaged the bar and ends. I also had to cut the bars after making so many holes in my wall and it still not fitting. Good luck. Two stars only because it would look good of mounting system worked
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Made of mostly plastic
customer_reviews.text: Moen quality has gone down. This is mostly mad of cheap plastic. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: DDG

customer_reviews.title: Love this rack
customer_reviews.text: Great value and looks great. Simple to install just hold it up and mark making sure its level
customer_reviews.author: Brent H

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ugh. So disappointing. The towel rack looks very nice but the hardware is poor quality. Our contractor installed the rack but when I went to put towels on the rack, it came detached from the wall. I definitely would NOT recommend this rack.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Great towel bar with lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Check to ensure you have enough depth available--it extends from the wall more than a single and did not work where I wanted to put it (on a small bathroom wall the door opened against). I switched it with a single bar in the larger bathroom and it worked great. I only wish I had checked before instead of after installing it. Other than my obvious stupidity, it's a super great towel bar and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Roddy Moody

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Choice!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bid fan of Moen products and this towel rack is no exception. Easy to install (hammer, awl and screw driver) and it looks great. This is the double rack so it has plenty of room for your towels.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Mis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, looks great, serves it purpose.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something relatively cheap and that matched our other fixtures. The only problem with this is that it's a bit noisy as the bars spin around when you pull the towels off.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Nice dual towel rack
customer_reviews.text: Nice dual towel rack. The best part is that it matched the holes of the single towel rack that I was replacing. Seems sturdy and durable enough to hold 2 big towels. Looks expensive too.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Gorospe

customer_reviews.title: Great, but tight between towels
customer_reviews.text: Makes great use of space. It's a bit tight in the middle when you put two towels next to each other but the bars roll so towels move easily.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product
customer_reviews.text: This is very cheaply made and it collapsed after hanging a wet bathing suit on it. It is made of thin ,cheap, hollow metal that you can easily bend. (It was installed by our contractor who said it seemed to be of poor quality). Now I am looking for a more solid double towel rack, that is sturdy and can actually hold damp things, like it is supposed to. Don't bother buying this.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Included anchors aren’t any good
customer_reviews.text: Anchors wouldn’t hold and the bar started to slip away from the door it was attached to. Never fell but always looks like it wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gorin

customer_reviews.title: I use the towel bar in my bedroom as a ...
customer_reviews.text: I use the towel bar in my bedroom as a pants hanger to keep the creases and to put out what tomorrow's pants will be worn. I also use it for, well, many other things. My bathroom has no window so I can dry face cloths on the bar, as well. If storage is a prmium, I could hang extra towels on the towel bar. It's attractive and serves me well.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Writer

customer_reviews.title: Not as high quality as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I expected too much or what, but the towel bar is not as high quality as I expected. That being said, it is still a nice bar and we are using it. I will have to lubricate the ends of the bars though as they make a horrific squeaking sound when they rotate when a towel is pulled off the rack.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy - towel rods flex
customer_reviews.text: This towel rack will hold towels. But sturdy and well built it is not. The rods spin and do not fit snuggly. They are also think metal and flex pretty easy. I imagine they will bend after repeated use. Would look for a sturdier rack if you will be using it frequently.
customer_reviews.author: ctankers

customer_reviews.title: Product is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to install and we are well satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: KayBill

customer_reviews.title: Rack too close together
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice towel rack but the 2 are too close together.
customer_reviews.author: James Pontius

customer_reviews.title: Good Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how I could love a towel bar so I am liking this one. It installed easily and works well. I would suggest that, at least, there be another inch or three between the two bars. It is difficult to get a thick towel between the two bars.
customer_reviews.author: William Bentrim

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Super easy to install. Tape the included installation template on your wall and drill the holes for the anchors and screw on the brackets. Then connect the ends and rods and voila! you are set! Very sturdy and solid, looks nice and shiny too! Took me about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie

customer_reviews.title: Returned item but not for lack of quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well-made product, it just didn't match our current hardware. I would definitely recommend as this is a good brand and this product is well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Installation was super simple with the easy to follow template
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were concerned that this would extend too far from the wall, but after installing it...it wasn't an issue! Both large fluffy bath towels dry fully by the next shower. Installation was super simple with the easy to follow template. Definitely a 5/5 !
customer_reviews.author: smartshop21

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful finished product though
customer_reviews.text: The length was longer than 24", that is the length of the poles, but the part that connects to the wall is about 26 inches which was too wide for the space we had. I was able to use a metal saw to take 2 inches off of each pole and make it work. Beautiful finished product though.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, but towels too close.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but it seems like the towels are right up next to each other and not separated enough, so they don't get the proper airing-out that they should. Still using, and generally satisfied, but concerned about that.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Tim

customer_reviews.title: looks great, but ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought several Moen products to go with our Kohler Devonshire bathroom fixtures. The others look good and work well. This looks very good, but the two bars are too close together for ease of use. We had to replace this double bar set with two individual bars.
customer_reviews.author: David Rubenstein

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: I had to have my bathroom remodeled because of a leaking shower pan. So I ordered this towel bar, as well as matching glass shelves, toilet roll dispenser, and a robe hook. They are all shiny chrome, and it adds a nice touch to my updated bathroom. Delivered promptly, easy to order, and just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Miami Books

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: The double towel rode looks nice. The only thing I wish is that the bars had a little more space between them for thicker towels.
customer_reviews.author: Kansas educator

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great for Low Cost
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for the remodel of our master bath. We loved the price and we loved the quality when it arrived. Very easy to install. They provide a paper guide in the directions to help you measure where to put your dry wall screws.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: The space for your towel and wash cloth.
customer_reviews.text: You can put two towel set on it. Me and my son have our own towel bar.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLENE ROBERSON

customer_reviews.title: Love hidden mounting
customer_reviews.text: Put this up in an exiting bathroom and the chrome and hidden mounting brackets matched existing rods. I put one folded towel over one bar. one over other and then one over both. Fairly easy to install. Just make sure to push the bracket in hard when tightening the little set screw.
customer_reviews.author: Alton D. Flanders

customer_reviews.title: Moen Double Towel Rack
customer_reviews.text: Ability to display and use 5-6 standard-sized bath towels! I love its quality. I gave it onlu 4 stars because I would have likes a shinier chrome.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Palavis

customer_reviews.title: We Like It!
customer_reviews.text: We like this Moen towel bar and the coordinated bathroom accessories in the Preston line. High-end quality, and relatively simple to install. All the pieces arrived as promised, and the instructions were clear and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: rrshortstack

customer_reviews.title: Best Towel Rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great space saving towel rack ever. I had purchase many years ago one for my small condo bathroom and I love it. So when I moved to my new home, I wanted another one and could not find it but was able to find it on Amazon. I was pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: KattRP

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bar at a reasonable price. Suggest screwing it into the studs for stability instead of using drywall anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Olvera

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, sturdy, easy to install, (modern) stylish, MUST HAVE! I don't know why I haven't had a dual towel bar before. You definitely need one in your bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Cech

customer_reviews.title: Bars roll
customer_reviews.text: The bars roll once installed. So if towels are not hung precisely in the middle, they’ll roll off and fall to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: S.R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I held off on writing a review on this for a while because it felt cheap when I mounted it. To my surprise it is holding up and works very well. It is very light weight and easy to install. It has turned out to be a real value.
customer_reviews.author: Search

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and is functional. My only complaint is that after taking down and rehanging towels on a daily basis, the screws work loose and it has to be retightened frequently.
customer_reviews.author: old maid

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Really love this towel bar. Bought two 30" towel bar inserts to use with this, and can now fully extend each towel out to hang dry without folding over. Works great. Didn't have any trouble mounting these, all hardware is included, they were a terrific price, and they look clean & elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Argiro

customer_reviews.title: ordered the double and it fits perfect after ordering this and being satisfied with this purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: I had previously ordered a single towel bar and it wasn't quite what we were looking for, ordered the double and it fits perfect after ordering this and being satisfied with this purchase I have since purchased additional items that complement this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Freddi

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice towel bar (double) and a space saver. The only complaint I have is that the box arrived torn open to include the actual box inside that it came in.
customer_reviews.author: A. K. Ubaydah

customer_reviews.title: looks nice and comes with clear directions and pattern to measure/align ...
customer_reviews.text: same bar exact bar for considerably less money than at a local home store. looks nice and comes with clear directions and pattern to measure/align holes, making it fairly easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: KC-Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The mounts on this thing suck, will not stay tight. It is a cheap piece of ****. Now I have to fix two holes in the wall and paint the while wall. To the trash it goes.
customer_reviews.author: fellow

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the Double Towel bar. It was easy to mount and other reviewers have said that the towels are too close when hung on both bars. I can see how they could make that point, but I found they both fit and were functional.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to guest bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: Double bar is perfect to increase hanging capacity in a guest bathroom. Very easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Tankard Smith

customer_reviews.title: looks great, installation is irritating
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice for the price, but the inside of the two knobs have this hardware that cannot be adjusted, so you need to figure out how to get the screws inside the knob and then have the screw slip through the hole. I eventually just gave up and hot glued the damn thing to my wall. Looks just the same.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: great price- kind of squeaky
customer_reviews.text: I was so thrilled when I found a double chrome towel bar for this price. I would have paid three to four times this amount somewhere else. Installation was interesting but if you are familiar with Moen products it will be a breeze. The reason this received four stars is because the outermost bar on the towel will spin and SCREECH something terrible when a towel is pulled off with too much friction. The noise will make your ear drums bleed. Just be a little gentle and don't take a towel from the outer bar when you are in a hurry and whip it off.
customer_reviews.author: lc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these and they have been great, allow my daughter towels to dry completely before next use, plenty of room between the towels. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: JennP

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and very useful.
customer_reviews.text: This towel rack was the perfect choice for the end of our new kitchen island. It is attractive and allows me to hang several different towels that I use for different purposes in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Wilkie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but a little flimsy for a Moen. It replaced a brass one of the same style, so I knew what I was getting. The older Moen towel bars were much heavier.
customer_reviews.author: David Barr

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. We have a tiny bathroom and this is helpful to use on the back of our door to hang our bath towels. It's the right sizesnd looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not a heavyweight but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Not heavy duty steel bars, but I haven't found anything better in this price range. I do not want to spend $50 plus for expensive towel bars, so I am happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: sumdayz

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, but the bars that the towel actually hangs on seems flemsy
customer_reviews.author: BSH002AC

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but.........
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and this was the second one of the same design I installed but it kept falling off one bracket. After four times of trying I had to turn the bracket upside down and then put the bar on the bracket. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy to install using the paper guide
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to install using the paper guide. Just line up the template on the wall and its ready for drilling.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey H.

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I hoped it would be. Not disappointed. Matched the bathroom accessories that I already had. Easy to install and sturdy. I bought a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: Liz W

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shiny chrome of this dual towel rack. It's in my daughter's bathroom. I brought one for myself from Bed Bayh before I saw this one on Amazon. Mine came apart a couple days after attaching it to the wall. Wish I had brought two of these fromAmazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: The towel bar looks great and is very strong. I like the fact is has two bars and is very stylish and strong. I recommend this towel bar to anyone who needs a two bar rack.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Q

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount. Looks great. The tubes are not permanently attached to the sides, so you can cut them shorter if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lars SveenTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow instructions for mounting
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted but couldn't get in my local store. Easy to follow instructions for mounting.
customer_reviews.author: maga

customer_reviews.title: Design is flawed and product is useless.
customer_reviews.text: Useless! The weight of a towel makes the rack come off the clips. I've mounted several towel racks before but this one has a design flaw and there is no way it can be made to stay up. No matter how hard you tighten the screw underneath it it comes off at the slightest weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian Larsson

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and price
customer_reviews.text: This a very nice looking item, which replaced 2 older towel bars in a bathroom remodel. shipping was quick, and the price was about half what I found for the same item at a local big-box store,.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good - for one towel
customer_reviews.text: These bars are good. The only drawback we've experienced is the space between the bars makes it hard to really hang two towels - both to fit them on, as well as for the towels to have sufficient space between them to actually air dry.
customer_reviews.author: A Golinski

customer_reviews.title: it has a nice finish. I like how I was able to ...
customer_reviews.text: it has a nice finish. I like how I was able to cut the poles to the width I needed to fit my installation
customer_reviews.author: Southern Maryland Camper

customer_reviews.title: This is a great looking towel bar but a bit narrow between from ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking towel bar but a bit narrow between from front to back. Still worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and practical for hanging two towels when you don't have room for a second bar.
customer_reviews.author: JamesD

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Moen DN8422CH Preston 24-inch double Towel Bar, Chrome Finish is beauiful, fits my bathroom decor. Make well and strong glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: amr

customer_reviews.title: Useless! The weight of a towel makes the rack ...
customer_reviews.text: Useless! The weight of a towel makes the rack come off the clips. I've mounted several towel racks before but this one has a design flaw and there is no way it can be made to stay up. No matter how hard you tighten the screw underneath it it comes off at the slightest weight.
customer_reviews.author: CUA V. HUYNH

customer_reviews.title: Nice finish & attractive look
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Would give 5 stars if toggle bolts were included as an option rather than just the plastic drywall anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Bird Lady

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and very good quality, however if you have thick towels its hard to put 2 towels and for it to dry. at time, its not dried after 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and light, but wasn't very expensive considering the alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set (I bought it with the towel ring and paper holder). It arrived quickly and looks great in the basement bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Woody7

customer_reviews.title: well made.
customer_reviews.text: nicely made. looks good. wish they had a 36 inch one though.
customer_reviews.author: Theoni LussosTop Contributor: Harmonicas

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: Mounting this was a nightmare. Screwed the plates into the wall and went to attach the bits that hold the middle rails in place, but the design was flawed and could not secure it properly without it falling off the wall with the slightest pressure. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds two towels without issue and was half the price of the home improvement store.
customer_reviews.author: sfrank

customer_reviews.title: exactly what it is
customer_reviews.text: double towel bar. purchased for the girls' bathroom. good size, fits right. what more can i say? it works for what i need
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice towel rack for the price. It is strong and looks good. We have not had a problem getting 2 towels on it.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES C COX

product_meta.title: Moen, Chrome DN8422CH Preston 24-Inch Bathroom Double Towel Bar
product_meta.description:
Color:ChromeWith its simple, low key design, the Moen Preston 24 Inch Bathroom Double Towel Bar adds a touch of understated style to your bathroom. Two sturdy bars offer ample space for multiple towels, washcloths, and other items. A stamped steel mounting bracket enhances durability, while the included mounting hardware and template make installation easy. The Preston Double Towel Bar features a highly reflective chrome finish for classic style that blends in with any bathroom decor.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This Moen Double Towel Bar with its soft, sleek design is the perfect complement to any décor. It also features decorative tank lever and easy installation. Moen is dedicated to designing and delivering beautiful products that last a lifetime. Moen offers a diverse selection of kitchen faucets, kitchen sinks, bathroom faucets and accessories, and showering products. Moen products combine style and functionality with durability for a lifetime of customer satisfaction.
feature_bullets: Simple, low key two bar, 24 inch long design
Stamped steel mounting bracket enhances durability
Mounting hardware and guided template included for quick and easy installation
